widget.title: Host CPU Utilization / PVM CPU Utilization (%)
Host Mem Utilization / PVM Mem Utilization (%)
Ruby Thread Status
widget.tips: Active threads: All alive threads including running, sleeping, and waiting. Running threads: Only threads currently executing code.

widget.title: Ruby GC Count Per Minute
widget.tips: Total: All garbage collections. Minor: Quick collections of young objects. Major: Full heap collections including old objects.

widget.title: Ruby Memory (MB)
widget.tips: Resident Set Size (RSS): Total physical memory used by the Ruby process, including heap, stack, and shared libraries.

widget.title: Ruby Heap Usage (%)
widget.tips: Percentage of Ruby heap slots currently in use. High usage may trigger garbage collection.

widget.title: Ruby Heap Slots
widget.tips: Live slots: Number of heap slots containing live objects. Available slots: Total heap slots available for object allocation.

widget.title: Ruby Memory Usage (%)
widget.tips: Process memory usage as a percentage of total system memory.

widget.title: Ruby GC Time (ms)
widget.tips: Cumulative garbage collection time in milliseconds.
